Package com.bfo.box

Class JsonBox

java.lang.Object
com.bfo.box.Box
com.bfo.box.DataBox
com.bfo.box.JsonBox
public class JsonBox extends DataBox
A "json" box contains a single JSON object. It is identical to CborBox except the value is serialized as JSON. It is defined in ISO19566-5 appendix B.4
Since:
5
